title: Why Stories Sell
description: A short lesson to help you apply Why Stories Sell.

hook.text: A painting sold for $5 at a thrift store. With a compelling backstory, it resold for $8,000.

buildup.text: The Significant Objects project proved that stories literally increase perceived value of items.

climax.text: Stories don't just describe value. They create it in the mind of the buyer.

punchline.text: Facts inform. Stories transform perceived value.
